original_text: I will disperse you among the nations and scatter you through the countries; and I will put an end to your uncleanness.
korean_text: 내가 너를 뭇 나라 가운데에 흩으며 각 나라에 헤치고 너의 더러운 것을 네 가운데에서 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: I will disperse you among the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 열국 중에 흩을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and scatter you through the countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여러 나라에 너를 흩어뜨릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will put an end to your uncleanness
